item.title: Assessment
item.description: The assessment, based on Literature review and the use of Mendeley software, shall be divided into two parts. 1. Home Assignment (25 marks) 2. Viva (15 marks) 1. Home Assignment For the following given research topics related to the Indian economy, write a relevant literature review and provide a bibliography using the Mendeley software. .tabwid table{ border-collapse:collapse; line-height:1; margin-left:auto; margin-right:auto; border-width: 0; display: table; margin-top: 1.275em; margin-bottom: 1.
